data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will persistently bring mainly fine weather to Guangdong tomorrow to early next week. It will be warm during the day with relatively large temperature difference between day and night over the region. An intense winter monsoon is expected to reach southern China next Tuesday. Temperatures will fall appreciably over the region and it will be windier afterwards. The weather over the coast of Guangdong will become cold in the middle and latter parts of next week. Meanwhile, a broad band of clouds will cover the region. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Nokaen will intensify gradually and linger over the seas east of the Philippines in the next couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260116","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 2 to 3.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine. Visibility relatively low in some areas at first.
